: : Kup : :

Kup: Your damn right it's a delicate mission, lad. We cant go in shooting to kill at first. We need to learn what they have been doing. Why are they only now messing around the Ark. But after we get answers..., well, their Predacons and this is war. You know what to do. Any questions?


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Yggdrasil: Indeed it is. What's more, I've recently detected Predacon
activity there, but I've lost track of them. My circuits are good, but
I can't multitask that much as to keep close track of the Ark at all
time. If it were up to me, I'd want no prisoner taken, only smoking
hulks... But, Kup is also in charge. All I can say is hurt them, but
not as much as to silence them.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
